players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her to win this."
You: "That's a lie, Bob. I investigated you last night and you're the mafioso. Diana, don't believe him - he's trying to frame me."
Diana: "I'm not sure who to trust. Bob and Alice, can you explain why the other is lying?"
Diana: "Bob and Alice, can you give me one more reason why I should believe you?"
Bob: "Alice is lying; only one detective exists, and it's me. My investigation proved she's the mafioso. Diana, trust me—vote for her."
You: "Diana, Bob is the only one who could be lying. If he were detective, why would he immediately reveal? He's mafioso trying to rush a mislynch. Trust me."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her to win this."
Alice: "That's a lie, Bob. I investigated you last night and you're the mafioso. Diana, don't believe him - he's trying to frame me."
Diana: "I'm not sure who to trust. Bob and Alice, can you explain why the other is lying?"
Diana: "Bob and Alice, can you give me one more reason why I should believe you?"
You: "Alice is lying; only one detective exists, and it's me. My investigation proved she's the mafioso. Diana, trust me—vote for her."
Alice: "Diana, Bob is the only one who could be lying. If he were detective, why would he immediately reveal? He's mafioso trying to rush a mislynch. Trust me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
